data.title: Repeat customer
data.text: The food is always great.  Crusty bread, French Onion soup and amazing salads.  I go back often to enjoy.

data.title: Excellent
data.text: I have been here many times, it is always excellent! It is casual, but the food is great, and the service is always excellent.

data.title: Delicious
data.text: Food is delicious. Be sure to try the French onion soup.  Also great pastries and desserts.  My favorite is the lemon custard pie. Just like my mother made.

data.title: French taste with American old West charm
data.text: Fabulous bakery with prompt friendly service. While I only had a muffin for breakfast, they also have salads and sandwiches on their lunch menu. The classical music in the background made for a peaceful place to gather my thoughts before work.

data.title: Great find!
data.text: We used the Mining Exchange next door as the family & friends hotel for our daughter's wedding the weekend of 10/2/2016.  Everyone in our 13 room group spread the word on the first day about this wonderful restaurant!  There was some form of us there for breakfast and lunch every day for 5 days.  The great food and friendly service were fantastic! We looked forward to a delicious breakfast and amazing pastries every morning!  Thank you for enhancing the wedding experience for all of us!

data.title: good for lunch
data.text: We like La Baguette so much we were going to go back the next day, but alas they aren't open on Sunday.  The salads and sandwiches were well constructed and the staff was friendly.

data.title: Breakfast Relaxed
data.text:
There are two locations for La Baguette, downtown Colorado Springs; on Pikes Peak and in Old Colorado City.

We prefer the Old Colorado City location

Quaint and rustic interior with several tables outside and even more inside.

The omelettes are three egg (very filling) and severed with fresh fruit and a roll.  My favorite is the ham and cheese...  Soups are ALWAYS great, homemade and hot.  Coffee is always available for those of us who relish it.

The menu is a basic French eatery... heavy breakfasts are available but not prominent.

Staff is always friendly and very helpful.
Specials abound.

data.title: WOW! Casual wonderful!
data.text: My wife and i stopped in for coffee. The place is an "order at counter, we will bring it over" syle, with extremely friendly staff. The smell of the breads and pastries was wonderful and the atmosphere welcoming. I ordered a breakfast croissant with ham, eggs, cheese and bearnaise sauce -- i didn't know what to expect. It was phenomenal! Super flaky, indulgent, buttery, and the eggs ham and cheese perfectly cooked. Bearnaise sauce on the side so you could choose your level of joy -- and fresh fruit. the staff came by and refilled coffee. Great place and close to Mining Exchange Hotel and Antlers Hilton -- a gem!

data.title: great food
data.text: THE PLACE in Colorado Springs for French onion soup. Great atmosphere , friendly staff, good prices and food to remember fondly.

data.title: GREAT FRENCH ONION SOUP, the best!!!
data.text: Great French café, lots of selections, rolls are fresh, quiche is amazing, there is not a bad thing in this café., amazing French Onion Soup, with croutons, ton's of cheese, bakes, steaming hot when it hit your table, served with a large rolls, the crust is so crisp, and then put on the butter, just can't beat that!! no way, no how!! keep up the great job, we are counting on you, to make our day, anytime of day!!  bye, for now, see you there!!!  p

data.title: incredibly nice people and great choice of baked goods
data.text:
incredibly nice people and great choice of baked goods
the owners son is in the air force...thank you for your service and sacrifice!

data.title: Wonderful for breakfast
data.text: The croissants were great.  Turkey and cheese with a side of Dijon was wonderful.  Service was quick and friendly.  Comfortable space, good coffee.

data.title: Great breakfast place
data.text: The atmosphere is nice. There is classical music and many paintings that makes the resteraunt seem as if its from france. The food is very good, esp. the omletes

data.title: Lunch with a Board Member
data.text:
I frequent this location about every other month. The food is always fresh and tasty. The quiche is always excellent. Overall the food is wonderful. 
I have had trouble paying in cash because the cashier never gives me the correct change. For example, if I pay with a $20 & my bill is $7, I should get $13 back. But instead I am handed $3. It is as if they don't remember you gave them a big bill or can't do math. I just avoid the problem by paying with a credit card and leaving the tip in cash.
The service is also very friendly. I enjoy coming here.

data.title: Great breakfast
data.text: Great coffee. Terrific rolls. Beautiful French omelettes. Two mornings in a row and would come again. Good looking sweets case.

data.title: Lunch with my daughter
data.text: We stopped and had the French dip and the French onion soup. Both were very good. It is a bit pricey for lunch in Colorado Springs, but the food is very good.

data.title: Would not take our group
data.text: We had 16 people and called at 3:00 in the afternoon to see if they could seat us in about 30 minutes. The person who answered the phone said they could not handle that many people in the afternoon and absolutely refused to discuss any possibility of us eating there. It was very disappointing and was not handled in a very polite way.

data.title: Good stop for coffee and pastries
data.text: Wish it's open for dinner. It has a variety if coffees and pastries. Rotating omelet options are good. It's bigger than it looks from the outside.

data.title: Authentic French Bakery!
data.text: Chocolate croissants and a cup of coffee was so perfect!  The pasteries are light and fluffy.  The service is just okay (you order at the counter and they bring it to you) but it works for a small breakfast place.

data.title: Locals Love It
data.text: We eat breakfast here whenever we're vacationing in Colorado Springs. The food is fresh and made to order. The ambience is terrific. The service is personable.
